description: Chris Thomas' actions broke government's collective responsibility rules, the chief minister says.
title: Chris Thomas: Isle of Man minister sacked for voting against government
title_page: Chris Thomas: Isle of Man minister sacked for voting against government - BBC News
maintext: "Mr Thomas did not adhere to this principle. It is with great sadness therefore that I have concluded that I can no longer have full confidence in Mr Thomas as a minister in this government."
